Package org.dblp.mmdb

Provides the dblp record main memory data base.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MmdbInterface
    A general interface for the main memory database (MMDB).
    RecordDbInterface
    The global interface for accessing dblp records from a dblp record DB structure.
    RecordDbLocalInterface
    The local query interface for accessing dblp records from a dblp record DB structure.
    UrlTypeTagInterface
    A tagging interface for classes (usually enums) that represent a URL ID type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BookTitle
    A class representing dblp book volume titles.
    Field
    A class representing a field inside a dblp Record.
    FieldReader
    A convenience class for accessing the field values and attributes of a dblp Record.
    JournalTitle
    A class representing dblp journal titles.
    LocalCoauthorNetwork
    A class representing the 1-hop coauthor neighborhood of a given reference person.
    Mmdb
    This class builds a simple main memory data structure for the dblp records.
    MultiStreamTitle
    A class representing the error case of ambiguous or even contradicting parent stream information within a Publication.
    Person
    A class representing dblp person records.
    PersonName
    A class representing a person name in dblp records of any type.
    Publication
    A class representing dblp publication records.
    PublicationStreamTitle
    An abstract base class for dblp publication stream venues.
    Record
    An abstract base class for dblp records.
    RecordDb
    An in-memory data structure for dblp's publication and person record corpus.
    Redirect
    A class representing dblp person redirection records.
    TableOfContents
    An class representing a logical toc unit in dblp.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PersonIDType
    An enumeration of person IDs.
    PublicationIDType
    An enumeration of publication IDs.
    PublicationStreamIDType
    An enumeration of publication stream IDs.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidPersonNameException
    A custom exception that signals that a given name is not valid to given dblp naming conventions.

Package org.dblp.mmdb Description

Provides the dblp record main memory data base.
